description.english: Die by electroshock.
description.german: Stirb durch Elektroschock.
description.french: Meurs d'un électrochoc.
description.italian: Morte da elettroshock.
description.spanish: Morirte por electrochoque.
description.japanese: 電気ショックで死亡する。
description.brazilian: Morra por um choque elétrico.

description.english: Die by slipping on the ground.
description.german: Stirb, indem du auf dem Boden ausrutschst.
description.french: Meurs en glissant sur le sol.
description.italian: Morte scivolando sul pavimento.
description.spanish: Morirte resbalando por el suelo.
description.japanese: 地面で滑って死亡する。
description.brazilian: Morra ao escorregar no chão.

description.english: Die by something falling on your head.
description.german: Stirb durch etwas, das dir auf den Kopf fällt.
description.french: Meurs à cause d'un objet tombé sur ta tête.
description.italian: Morte da qualcosa che ti cade sulla testa.
description.koreana: 머리 위에 떨어진 것에 의해 사망하다.
description.spanish: Morirte por algo que cae sobre tu cabeza.
description.russian: Смерть от чего-то, падающего на голову.
description.japanese: 頭上に何かが落ちてきて死亡する。
description.brazilian: Morra com algo caindo em sua cabeça.

description.english: Die by being shot.
description.german: Stirb durch einen Schuss.
description.french: Tué par balle.
description.italian: Morte ucciso da qualcuno.
description.spanish: Morirte por asesinado por mano de alguien.
description.japanese: 撃たれて死亡する。
description.brazilian: Morra ao receber um tiro.

displayName.japanese: とてつもなくひどいこと

description.english: End the game perpetuating a crime.
description.german: Beende das Spiel, indem du weiterhin Verbrechen begehst.
description.french: Finit le jeu en réalisant un crime.
description.italian: Finisci il gioco perpetuanto un crimine.
description.spanish: Terminar el juego perpetuando un crimen.
description.tchinese: 以罪犯的身份結束遊戲。
description.japanese: 永遠に罪を償い続ける。
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo cometendo um crime.

description.english: Find a way to skip a minute.
description.german: Finde einen Weg, um eine Minute zu überspringen.
description.french: Trouve un moyen d'aller une minute dans le futur.
description.italian: Trova il modo di saltare un minuto.
description.koreana: 1분 앞의 미래로 갈 수 있는 방법을 찾아라.
description.spanish: Encontrar formas de saltarse un minuto.
description.tchinese: 找到能跳過一分鐘的方法。
description.japanese: 時間を1分進める方法を見つける。
description.brazilian: Encontre uma forma de viajar no tempo.

description.english: Escape the firewall.
description.german: Umgehe die Firewall.
description.french: Échappe toi du pare-feu.
description.italian: Fuggi dal firewall.
description.spanish: Escapar del cortafuegos.
description.japanese: ファイアウォールを脱出する。
description.brazilian: Escape do firewall.

description.english: Find out what you really are.
description.german: Finde heraus, was du wirklich bist.
description.french: Réalise qui tu es réellement.
description.italian: Scopri cosa sei veramente.
description.spanish: Descubrir lo que realmente eres.
description.russian: Узнайте, кто вы на самом деле.
description.japanese: 自分が本当は何なのかを知る。
description.brazilian: Descubra o que você realmente é.

description.english: Is there light at the end of the tunnel?
description.german: Gibt es Licht am Ende des Tunnels?
description.french: La lumière au bout du tunnel?
description.italian: C'è luce alla fine del tunnel?
description.spanish: ¿Hay luz al final del túnel?
description.russian: Есть ли свет в конце туннеля?
description.japanese: このトンネルの向こうに光はあるのか？
description.brazilian: Existe uma luz no fim do túnel?

description.english: The future of acting.
description.german: Die Zukunft des Schauspielens.
description.french: Le futur du jeu d'acteur.
description.italian: Il futuro della recitazione.
description.spanish: El futuro de la actuación.
description.schinese: 表演的未来是什么样的。
description.japanese: 演技の未来がここに。
description.brazilian: O futuro da atuação.

description.english: Sometimes you are not a hero.
description.german: Manchmal bist du kein Held.
description.french: Quelque fois, tu n'es pas le héros.
description.italian: A volte non sei un eroe.
description.spanish: A veces no eres un héroe.
description.japanese: あなたは主役とは限らない。
description.brazilian: Nem todo mundo pode ser o protagonista.

description.english: Humankind can be saved after the apocalypse.
description.german: Die Menschheit kann nach der Apokalypse gerettet werden.
description.french: L'humanité peut être sauvé après l'apocalypse.
description.italian: La razza umana può essere salvata dopo l'apocalisse.
description.koreana: 인류는 종말 이후에 구원될 수 있다.
description.spanish: La raza humana puede salvarse después del apocalipsis.
description.schinese: 人类可以在天劫之后得到拯救。
description.tchinese: 拯救人類免於世界末日。
description.russian: Человечество может быть спасено после апокалипсиса.
description.japanese: 世界が終わりを迎えても人類は救済できる。
description.brazilian: A humanidade pode ser salva após o apocalipse.

description.english: It's not a good idea to put work in front of everything else.
description.german: Es ist keine gute Idee, die Arbeit vor alles andere zu stellen.
description.french: Ce n'est pas un bonne idée de mettre le travail avant tout le reste.
description.italian: Non è una buona idea mettere il lavoro prima di tutto.
description.koreana: 일을 그 어떤 것보다도 우선시 하는 건 좋은 생각이 아니다.
description.spanish: No es una buena idea poner el trabajo primero.
description.schinese: 把工作放在首位可不是个好主意。
description.tchinese: 凡事以工作為優先並不是一個好主意。
description.russian: Не очень хорошая идея, чтобы поставить работу на первое место.
description.japanese: 何よりも仕事を優先するのはオススメしない。
description.brazilian: Talvez não seja uma boa ideia colocar o trabalho acima de todo o resto.

description.english: Someone is trying to discover where you hid your secret project.
description.german: Jemand versucht herauszufinden, wo du dein geheimes Projekt versteckt hast.
description.french: Quelqu'un essaye de savoir la cachette de ton projet secret.
description.italian: Qualcuno sta cercando di scoprire dove hai nascosto il tuo progetto segreto.
description.koreana: 누군가 당신이 비밀 프로젝트를 숨킨 곳을 찾아내려고 하고 있다.
description.spanish: Alguien está tratando de averiguar dónde escondiste tu proyecto secreto.
description.schinese: 有人正试图找到你隐藏秘密项目的位置。
description.tchinese: 有人試圖找出你隱藏秘密計畫的位置。
description.russian: Кто -то пытается выяснить, где вы спрятали свой секретный проект.
description.japanese: 誰かがあなたの隠した秘密を暴こうとしている。
description.brazilian: Alguém está tentando descobrir onde você escondeu seu projeto secreto.

description.english: Reach run number 8.
description.german: Erreiche den achten Durchgang.
description.french: Atteindre la 8eme partie.
description.italian: Raggiungi la partita numero 8.
description.spanish: Alcanzar el partido número 8.
description.tchinese: 遊戲嘗試次數達到 8 次。
description.japanese: 8周目に到達する。
description.brazilian: Chegue até sua oitava partida.

description.english: Kill that guy.
description.german: Töte diesen Kerl.
description.french: Tue ce mec.
description.italian: Uccidi quel tizio.
description.spanish: Matar a ese tipo.
description.japanese: あの男を殺す。
description.brazilian: Mate aquele homem.

description.english: Call Monique to reconcile with her.
description.german: Rufe Monique an, um dich mit ihr zu versöhnen.
description.french: Appelle Monique pour te réconcilier avec elle.
description.italian: Chiama Monique e riconciliati con lei..
description.spanish: Llamar a Monique y reconcíliarte con ella.
description.tchinese: 打電話給Monique並與她重修舊好。
description.russian: Позвоните Монике, чтобы примириться с ней.
description.japanese: モニークに電話して和解する。
description.brazilian: Ligue para Monique e se reconcilie.

description.english: Trigger an ending within the third run.
description.german: Löse ein Ende innerhalb des dritten Durchlaufs aus.
description.french: Débloque un des fins lors de ta troisième partie.
description.italian: Raggiungi uno dei finali entro la terza partita..
description.koreana: 세 번째 회차 안에 엔딩에 도달한다.
description.spanish: Alcanzar uno de los finales dentro del tercer juego.
description.tchinese: 於 3 次遊戲嘗試內觸發任一結局。
description.russian: Добраться до одного из финалов в третьей игре.
description.japanese: 3周回以内にエンディングに到達する。
description.brazilian: Complete o jogo dentro de três partidas.

displayName.brazilian: Ele não é o mais Esperto da Turma

description.english: Reach run number 50.
description.german: Erreiche den 50 Durchgang.
description.french: Atteindre la 50eme partie.
description.italian: Raggiungi la partita numero 50.
description.spanish: Alcanzar el juego número 50.
description.tchinese: 遊戲嘗試次數達到 50 次。
description.japanese: 50周目に到達する。
description.brazilian: Alcance a partida número 50.

displayName.japanese: 開発者のエンディング

description.english: Die old.
description.german: Stirb alt.
description.french: Meurs vieux.
description.italian: Muori vecchio.
description.spanish: Morirte viejo.
description.japanese: 年老いて死亡する。
description.brazilian: Morra de velhice.
